items.label: Unpaid care (5 categories)

categories.label: Provides 19 or less hours unpaid care a week
Provides 20 to 49 hours unpaid care a week

items.quality_statement_text: We did not ask people aged under five years whether they provided unpaid care, so this variable counts usual residents aged five years and over.
